---
title: "Rendering a Quarto document for first time"
format: html
editor: visual
---

# Standard code block
```{r}
x <- 1
print(x)
log(-x)
```
# Exclude source code
```{r}
#| echo: false
x <- 2
print(x)
log(-x)
```
# Exclude output
```{r}
#| eval: false
x <- 3
print(x)
log(-x)
```
# Exclude warnings
```{r}
#| warning: false
x <- 4
print(x)
log(-4)
```
# Suppress everything
```{r}
#| include: false
x <- 5
print(x)
log(x)
```
# Add figure
```{r}
#| out-width: "90%"
knitr::include_graphics("img/wanna_see_the_code_2x.png")
```
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| out-width: "4in"
knitr::include_graphics("img/norm_normal_file_format_2x.png")
```
